title: The One Where Lala Gets Real About Childbirth and Pregnancy
description:
Lala’s assistant, Jessica, has lots and lots of questions about all things pregnancy and childbirth for Lala and her mom, Lisa! And these two do not hold anything back! They cover everything from morning sickness and puking to catheters and enemas to placenta and mucus plugs! They also get real about post-partum depression, post-baby bodies, adult diapers, the healing process down below, and sex after baby! Hear their takes on breastfeeding, formula, colicky babies, and cravings! Plus, Lala shares some thoughts on the most recent #PumpRules episode!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
